snippet: Masahiro Tanaka, the Yankees rookie starter, soaked up anything he could gather from the Mariners’ veteran Hisashi Iwakuma, eight years his elder, when they were teammates in Japan.
abstract: New York Yankees rookie pitcher Masahiro Tanaka soaked up as much as possible from friend and mentor Hisashi Iwakuma when they were teammates in Japan; two pitchers will face off as Yankees play the Seattle Mariners in series.
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka, the Yankees rookie starter, soaked up anything he could gather from the Mariners’ veteran Hisashi Iwakuma, eight years his elder, when they were teammates in Japan.

headline.main: Tanaka Follows Iwakuma, Then Sets Himself Apart
headline.print_headline: Tanaka Follows Iwakuma, Then Sets Himself Apart
